name: Aestha: The runner game
summary: Try Aesthar now! Explore magical worlds playing as the brave Kara and his mount Balkar, a magical rabbit that will help you overcome the most difficult obstacles that you will find along your adventure to defeat the evil Zelius. Aesthar stages will surprise you with its control system of the characters and incredible aesthetic. Aesthar features a soundtrack that will make you live a unique experience. Aesthar is the perfect game for your phone!
